segments.text: Can you tell me , Ms . Smith , about the training programs you initiated this year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ran a call center training service and language program to ensure that our customer service representatives are well trained .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We directly attribute an increase in our customer service feedback of 50 % to the increase in language skills and training that our employees have received .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That seems very impressive . Good work !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , but I cannot take all the credit . Our employees have all worked very hard to increase their productivity level .
segments.speaker: S2
